mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Relates that John Walker was appointed Senator following William Grayson's death; includes further instructions for sending Jefferson's belongings from France, including several book requests; alludes to discussions of diplomatic appointments; relays news of Benjamin Franklin's death.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Franklin, Benjamin, 1706-1790
Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1790 April 27, New York, [New York] to [William] Short, n.p.
